Obama on Feminism

August 4, 2016

But I also have to admit that when youâ€™re the father of two daughters, you become even more aware of how gender stereotypes pervade our society. You see the subtle and not-so-subtle social cues transmitted through culture. You feel the enormous pressure girls are under to look and behave and even think a certain way.

This sums up my biggest challenge as the father of a daugther.
